nodes.text: The Cistern of Discipline was a location on Corellia filled with water. Lady Proxima sent White Worms there after a storm to scavenge for flotsam and catch fleek eels and coppergrins. It was more oftenly used as a punishment for people who couldn't keep up with Proxima's quotas or missed curfew to many times if they could swim to the end they were forgiven.
